select tb.fileID, tb.thumbnailPath, tb.fileName from t_common_file tb left join device_task_pic tt on tt.fileID = tb.fileID where tt.itemID = #itemID#

SELECT a.departNo AS deptID, a.departName AS NAME, ifnull(sum(a.num), 0) AS jgnum, ifnull(sum(a.wgnum), 0) AS wgnum, ifnull(sum(a.csnum), 0) AS csnum, ifnull(sum(a.zxnum), 0) AS zxnum, ifnull(sum(a.cswgnum), 0) AS cswgnum FROM ( SELECT t.departNo, t.departName, 1 AS num, case t.status when '2' then 1 else 0 end as wgnum, case t.status when '-1' then 1 else 0 end as csnum, case t.status when '1' then 1 else 0 end as zxnum, case t.status when '4' then 1 else 0 end as cswgnum FROM dk_task t where 1=1
DATE_FORMAT(t.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #startTimeS#
DATE_FORMAT(t.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #startTimeE#
) a GROUP BY a.departName,a.departNo
